001package gbw.melange.common.shading.constants;
002
003import java.util.HashMap;
004import java.util.Map;
005
006/**
007 * <p>GLShaderAttr class.</p>
008 *
009 * @author GustavBW
010 * @version $Id: $Id
011 */
012public enum GLShaderAttr {
013    POSITION("a_position"),
014    PROJECTION_MATRIX("u_projTrans"),
015    COLOR("a_color"),
016    TEXTURE("u_texture"),
017    VERTEX_COORDS("v_texCoords"),
018    NORMAL("a_normal"),
019    TANGENT("a_tangent"),
020    TEX_COORD0("a_texCoord0"),
021    BONE_WEIGHTS("a_boneWeights"),
022    BONE_INDICES("a_boneIndices");
023
024    private final String name;
025
026    GLShaderAttr(String name) {
027        this.name = name;
028    }
029
030    /**
031     * <p>Getter for the field <code>name</code>.</p>
032     *
033     * @return a {@link java.lang.String} object
034     */
035    public String glValue() {
036        return name;
037    }
038
039    private static final Map<String,Integer> locations = new HashMap<>();
040}
